argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | gsummhm2.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | gsummhm2.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | gsummhm2.g | |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) |
| 4 |  | gsummhm2.h | |- ( ph -> H e. Mnd ) |
| 5 |  | gsummhm2.a | |- ( ph -> A e. V ) |
| 6 |  | gsummhm2.k | |- ( ph -> ( x e. B |-> C ) e. ( G MndHom H ) ) |
| 7 |  | gsummhm2.f | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> X e. B ) |
| 8 |  | gsummhm2.w | |- ( ph -> ( k e. A |-> X ) finSupp .0. ) |
| 9 |  | gsummhm2.1 | |- ( x = X -> C = D ) |
| 10 |  | gsummhm2.2 | |- ( x = ( G gsum ( k e. A |-> X ) ) -> C = E ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( k e. A |-> X ) = ( k e. A |-> X ) |
| 12 | 7, 11 | #P_fmptd | |- ( ph -> ( k e. A |-> X ) : A --> B ) |
| 13 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 12, 8 | #P_gsummhm | |- ( ph -> ( H gsum ( ( x e. B |-> C ) o. ( k e. A |-> X ) ) ) = ( ( x e. B |-> C ) ` ( G gsum ( k e. A |-> X ) ) ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( ph -> ( k e. A |-> X ) = ( k e. A |-> X ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( ph -> ( x e. B |-> C ) = ( x e. B |-> C ) ) |
| 16 | 7, 14, 15, 9 | #P_fmptco | |- ( ph -> ( ( x e. B |-> C ) o. ( k e. A |-> X ) ) = ( k e. A |-> D ) ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ph -> ( H gsum ( ( x e. B |-> C ) o. ( k e. A |-> X ) ) ) = ( H gsum ( k e. A |-> D ) ) ) |
| 18 | 1, 2, 3, 5, 12, 8 | #P_gsumcl | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( k e. A |-> X ) ) e. B ) |
| 19 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` H ) = ( Base ` H ) |
| 20 | 1, 19 | #P_mhmf | |- ( ( x e. B |-> C ) e. ( G MndHom H ) -> ( x e. B |-> C ) : B --> ( Base ` H ) ) |
| 21 | 6, 20 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( x e. B |-> C ) : B --> ( Base ` H ) ) |
| 22 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( x e. B |-> C ) = ( x e. B |-> C ) |
| 23 | 22 | #P_fmpt | |- ( A. x e. B C e. ( Base ` H ) <-> ( x e. B |-> C ) : B --> ( Base ` H ) ) |
| 24 | 21, 23 | #P_sylibr | |- ( ph -> A. x e. B C e. ( Base ` H ) ) |
| 25 | 10 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( x = ( G gsum ( k e. A |-> X ) ) -> ( C e. ( Base ` H ) <-> E e. ( Base ` H ) ) ) |
| 26 | 25 | #P_rspcv | |- ( ( G gsum ( k e. A |-> X ) ) e. B -> ( A. x e. B C e. ( Base ` H ) -> E e. ( Base ` H ) ) ) |
| 27 | 18, 24, 26 | #P_sylc | |- ( ph -> E e. ( Base ` H ) ) |
| 28 | 10, 22 | #P_fvmptg | |- ( ( ( G gsum ( k e. A |-> X ) ) e. B /\ E e. ( Base ` H ) ) -> ( ( x e. B |-> C ) ` ( G gsum ( k e. A |-> X ) ) ) = E ) |
| 29 | 18, 27, 28 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( ( x e. B |-> C ) ` ( G gsum ( k e. A |-> X ) ) ) = E ) |
| 30 | 13, 17, 29 | #P_3eqtr3d | |- ( ph -> ( H gsum ( k e. A |-> D ) ) = E ) |
